Employment

 

Financial Services


L&M Consulting Group, Inc. provides various financial services in the countries of Central Asia and CIS region, including Uzbekistan, partnering with major global financial institutions, investment firms, and banks involved in providing investment funds and issuing loans. Cargill Financial Services International Inc. is one of the many global companies, which L&M Consulting Group, Inc. has been working with for many years. For over 25 years, Cargill Financial Services International Inc. has been providing financial services in countries of Central Asia and CIS region in the form of loans and other borrowing instruments, totalling in more than $5B.
